entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
